name: Catty Chaos
description:
Each day in this house is a battle between calm and chaos. Cats and Humans.

Catty Chaos is a game where a team of two Cats aims to create maximum Chaos for their two Human owners, while the Humans do their best to mollify their feline companions, keeping the household Calm.

This game is for 2-4 Players.

I originally made this game for a class. I may add more to it later.  If you play it, feel free to comment and let me know what you think of it!
